1.0.7.name: wordpress/get-user-info
1.0.7.description: Choose to display any of the following for any user: user name, first and last name, avatar, description or website. A title can be added along with a css class to allow styling if needed. Is available as a widget or shortcode. Use [userinfo user="User Name" class="CssClass" title="My Title" username="true" name="true" avatar="true" description="true" website="true"].
